data.comment: The match has started at Marc Antonio Bentegodi.
Manuel Volpi signals a Verona throw-in in Lazio's half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Lazio in their own half.
Throw-in for Lazio at Marc Antonio Bentegodi.
Lazio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Verona.
Important block from the Lazio defence as Mattia Zaccagni fires in a strike for Verona.
Verona to take a throw-in in Lazio territory.
In the minute 4, Throw-in high up the field for Verona in Verona.
Manuel Volpi awards Lazio a goal kick.
Ball safe as Lazio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Can Lazio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Verona's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Verona are coming forward and Valentin Eysseric gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Lazio at Marc Antonio Bentegodi.
Corner awarded to Verona.
Fabio Borini gets his shot on target but fails to score for Verona.
In the minute 11, Lazio's Sergej Milinkovic-Savic gets in a shot on goal at Marc Antonio Bentegodi. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Verona Lazio attack through Ciro Immobile. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Lazio in the half of Verona.
Throw-in for Lazio close to the penalty box.
Can Lazio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Verona's half?
In the minute 16, Manuel Volpi awards the away team a throw-in.
Verona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Manuel Volpi signals a Lazio throw-in in Verona's half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Lazio.
In Verona a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Lazio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, Davide Faraoni (Verona) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
In Verona, Matteo Pessina of Verona is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 21, Verona push upfield but Manuel Volpi quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Lazio at Marc Antonio Bentegodi.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Manuel Volpi.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Lazio.
Free kick Verona.
Throw-in for Verona in the half of Lazio.
In the minute 25, Verona push forward at Marc Antonio Bentegodi and Fabio Borini gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lazio defence.
In Verona Verona drive forward through Miguel Veloso. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Verona have been awarded a corner by Manuel Volpi.
In the minute 28, Verona to take a throw-in in Lazio territory.
Manuel Volpi awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
In the minute 30, Lazio's Luis Alberto gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Verona defender.
Free kick in a good position for Lazio!
Sergej Milinkovic-Savic for Lazio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 32, Verona have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Lazio push forward at Marc Antonio Bentegodi and Joaquin Correa gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Verona defence.
Attention is being given to Veronaâ€™s Amir Rrahmani and play has been suspended briefly.
Verona have been awarded a penalty in Verona...
In the minute 36, Can Lazio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Verona's half?
Amir Rrahmani is back on his feet again.
It's advantage Verona in Verona as Sofyan Amrabat scores from the spot to make it 1-0.
In the minute 40, Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Lazio.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
Throw-in for Verona in their own half.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Verona in the half of Lazio.
In Verona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Lazio's Luis Alberto gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
At Marc Antonio Bentegodi the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Verona in their own half.
In the minute 45, Manuel Volpi signals a Verona throw-in in Lazio's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
Lazio have been given a penalty at Marc Antonio Bentegodi...
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Marc Antonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 45, Amir Rrahmani (Verona) has received a first yellow card.
Ciro Immobile levels the score at 1-1 from the penalty spot.
The second-half is underway in Verona.
Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
In the minute 48, Lazio have been awarded a corner by Manuel Volpi.
In Verona, Francesco Acerbi (Lazio) misses the target with a header.
Manuel Volpi awards Verona a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Manuel Volpi awards the away team a throw-in.
Darko Lazovic hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Verona!
Corner awarded to Verona.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Verona.
Verona have been awarded a corner by Manuel Volpi.
Can Lazio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Verona's half?
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Lazio in the half of Verona.
Lazio to take a throw-in in Verona territory.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Lazio close to the penalty box.
In the minute 56, Sergej Milinkovic-Savic puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
Throw-in for Verona in the half of Lazio.
Free kick for Verona in the half of Lazio.
In the minute 58, Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Verona.
Fabio Borini of Verona smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Verona.
In the minute 61, Can Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lazio's half?
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Manuel Volpi.
Lazio take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Joaquin Correa.
In the minute 64, Verona have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 65, Manuel Volpi signals a throw-in for Verona, close to Lazio's area.
Denis Vavro is on a sub for Patric for Lazio.
Lazio make their second substitution with Jordan Lukaku replacing Djavan Anderson.
Manuel Volpi signals a Verona throw-in in Lazio's half.
Can Verona capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 67, Adam Marusic (Lazio) gets a yellow card.
The home team replace Fabio Borini with Samuel Di Carmine.
Eddie Salcedo is replacing Mattia Zaccagni for the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Simone Inzaghi (Lazio) is making a third substitution, with Felipe Caicedo replacing Joaquin Correa.
Verona's Valentin Eysseric breaks free at Marc Antonio Bentegodi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 70, Lazio have a goal kick.
Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Verona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Lazio.
Ball goes out of play for a Verona goal kick.
Throw-in for Verona at Marc Antonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 77, Lazio needs to be cautious. Verona have an attacking throw-in.
Verona to take a throw-in in Lazio territory.
Lazio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 78, In Verona, Eddie Salcedo (Verona) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Verona have a dangerous throw-in.
The home team replace Davide Faraoni with Federico Dimarco.
In the minute 80, Verona have been awarded a corner by Manuel Volpi.
Amir Rrahmani (Verona) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Verona push forward at Marc Antonio Bentegodi and Federico Dimarco gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Lazio defence.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Verona.
Verona are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Verona in their own half.
Can Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lazio's half?
Great finish from Ciro Immobile to give Lazio a 1-4 lead.
In the minute 83, Great play from Jordan Lukaku to set up the goal.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Lazio at Marc Antonio Bentegodi.
Manuel Volpi signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
Thomas Strakosha (Lazio) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 87, Ivan Juric is making the team's fourth substitution at Marc Antonio Bentegodi with Mariusz Stepinski replacing Valentin Eysseric.
Lucas Felippe is on a sub for Miguel Veloso for Verona.
Verona's Mariusz Stepinski gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 88, Goal kick for Lazio at Marc Antonio Bentegodi.
Nicolo Armini is replacing Adam Marusic for Lazio at Marc Antonio Bentegodi.
The away team have replaced Sergej Milinkovic-Savic with Andre Anderson. This is the fifth substitution made today by Simone Inzaghi.
In the minute 89, Manuel Volpi awards Lazio a goal kick.
Verona's Federico Dimarco gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lazio defender.
Lazio are caught offside.
Manuel Volpi will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Manuel Volpi signals a throw-in for Verona, close to Lazio's area.
Lazio have a goal kick.
Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lazio have been awarded a penalty...
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-5.
Boris Radunovic is booked for the home team.
Lazio have extended their lead to 1-5 courtesy of a Ciro Immobile penalty.
